document.full_text: africa's largest telephone group telkom  is selling part of its loss-making multi-links operation in nigeria for $52 million to visafone communications, sending its shares higher.
document.title: south africa's telkom sells part of multi-links
lines_and_colors: africa's largest telephone group telkom  is selling part of its loss-making multi-links operation in nigeria for $52 million to visafone communications, sending its shares higher.
